pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Rahul Gandhi, President of the Indian National Congress | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml: The Prime Minister and Mr. Gandhi shared their mutual support for pluralism and respect for diversity and inclusion. They discussed human rights and the need to combat sexual violence against women and girls. In discussing the changing global landscape, they shared views on engaging youth and women as leaders for change. Prime Minister Trudeau and Mr. Gandhi discussed poverty and gender inequality, recognizing the need for growth that benefits everyone.
